# 📅 ACM India Summer School 2025 – Schedule  
📍 IIT Gandhinagar | 📆 **02–13 June 2025**

---
title: "Schedule – ACM India Summer School 2025"
format: html
page-layout: full
---

<div id="schedule-table"></div>

<!-- Tabulator -->
<link href="https://unpkg.com/tabulator-tables@5.5.0/dist/css/tabulator.min.css" rel="stylesheet">
<script src="https://unpkg.com/tabulator-tables@5.5.0/dist/js/tabulator.min.js"></script>

<!-- D3 -->
<script src="https://d3js.org/d3.v7.min.js"></script>

<script>
d3.csv("schedule.csv").then(function(raw) {
  const startTime = raw.map(row => row["Start Time"]);
  const endTime = raw.map(row => row["End Time"]);

  const dateColumns = Object.keys(raw[0]).filter(k => !["Start Time", "End Time"].includes(k));
  let tableData = [];

  dateColumns.forEach(date => {
    raw.forEach((row, i) => {
      const event = row[date]?.trim();
      if (event) {
        tableData.push({
          Date: date,
          Time: `${startTime[i] || ""} – ${endTime[i] || ""}`,
          Event: event
        });
      }
    });
  });

  new Tabulator("#schedule-table", {
    data: tableData,
    layout: "fitColumns",
    pagination: true,
    paginationSize: 10,
    columns: [
      { title: "Date", field: "Date", headerFilter: true },
      { title: "Time", field: "Time" },
      {
        title: "Event",
        field: "Event",
        formatter: function(cell) {
          const val = cell.getValue();
          const lower = val.toLowerCase();

          if (lower.includes("break")) {
            return `<div style="background:#eee;padding:4px;">${val}</div>`;
          } else if (lower.includes("lunch")) {
            return `<div style="background:#fff8dc;padding:4px;">${val}</div>`;
          } else if (lower.includes("keynote")) {
            return `<div style="background:#d0e7ff;padding:4px;">${val}</div>`;
          } else if (lower.includes("tutorial") || lower.includes("lab")) {
            return `<div style="background:#e6ffe6;padding:4px;">${val}</div>`;
          } else {
            return val;
          }
        }
      }
    ]
  });
});
</script>
